msg.msgText: The client failed to connect to Message Gateway because either the specified host is null or the specified port number is not in the range 0 to 65535: Host={0} Port={1}.

msgExplanation.p: The client requires a non-null string value specified for the Server property and an integer value in the range 0 to 65535 to make a connection request.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the Server property for the connection object is set and that the Port property is set to a value in the range 0 to 65535.
